website_summaries.verdict: One bottle, 3 uses: cleans dirty leather, conditions, and protects all leather goods from future cracking.
pros: Revitalizes cracked leather, breathes new life into items needing some TLC
cleans dirty leather and restores leather like new
cons: Could leave car seats feeling slippery
Has odd odor that smells fruity, pungent

customer_reviews.title: Professional Detailer Approved
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I own a professional detailing business, that have contracts with used car lots, so we're always looking for better products. I was a little scared to purchase this leather conditioner, but wanted something better than the other conditioners I've used over the years. I'm so glad I did. One word, amazing! We always try out new products on our vehicles (other family members or neighbor vehicles) first, just in case. We were extremely impressed with the results. My husband ended up taking all the other leather conditioners out of our Detailer case and replaced it with this. We will definitely be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Honestly Confused (dotcom)

customer_reviews.title: Made 7 year old leather furniture look and feel like new!
customer_reviews.text: Had Lazy boy recliner with water damage and some mildew. Didn't affect discoloration but did revitalize the leather. Lane sofa recliner, made leather look and feel like new. Not too glossy, no chemical odor. Both items 7+ years old. Very satisfied and impressed with product. Can and will recommend with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: TriNova is easy to use and instantly improved the suppleness of our ...
customer_reviews.text: We live in a cold and dry climate and hadn't conditioned our leather furniture for over a year .TriNova is easy to use and instantly improved the suppleness of our leather furniture. It isn't greasy and doesn't leave darkened areas if you follow the directions and wipe with a damp cloth before treatment. I did not know that trick! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!!!! I highly recommend anyone in desperate need of cleaning their leather coach, shoes, jacket, whatever. I had tough white sunscreen stain on my black leather car seat and was so devasted because I tried other products and I thought the stain will never come out. So I searched desperately and found this product. Initially I thought it was expensive compared to the other cleaners, but I was desperate. I'm so happy I made the purchase. Now stains gone, and my leather seats are shining with joy haha. Highly recommended!

customer_reviews.title: My truck seats look brand new again!
customer_reviews.text: My truck is just over 12 months old and I wanted to provide some nourishment to my leather seats so I gave this product a try and I wasn’t’ disappointed. My seats now look brand new. My wife’s car is 3 years old and her leather seats had a lot more wear on them because I hadn’t cleaned nor conditioned the leather at all and this product made them look so much better. My wife was very happy with the results as well. I didn’t think the faint smell was bad at all and it was gone within a day. I will buy again and tell my friends about the product as well.
customer_reviews.author: shadowlesss

customer_reviews.title: TriNova Leather Conditioner and Cleaner, 18 oz
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this cleaner I really wasn't expecting it to be as good as the reviews claimed, simply because my leather sofa is about 16 yrs old. I can't believe what this product did to my sofa! It actually cleaned it up really GREAT! I was surprised and shocked. It also removed stains from spilled liquids. I will be using this stuff regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K.

customer_reviews.title: VERY IMPRESSED!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used tons of different cleaners and conditioners on my cars leather seats but this one is hands down the best. It not only cleaned the seats but darkened the black leather and left a nice natural shine.
customer_reviews.author: Clothilde J Sypinski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for cleaning and conditioning car seats
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job cleaning up the grime from my off-white leather car seats. I needed a fair amount of elbow grease in some spots, but that wasn't the fault of this product. The leather seemed a bit softer after using it. It does have a bit of a scent, which dissipates in about 12 hours. I happened to like it...it was refreshing, like a margarita. Also: good customer service: the seller reached out with tips on how best to use it. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: HarV eye

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible, sent it back
customer_reviews.text: I’m really stunned by the number of 5 star reviews. Are people being paid for those good reviews? This smells so bad it’s unusable. Maybe after a while the smell will disappear but wow,just wow. I don know how to describe the smell, something just chemical and rotting and body Oder? No matter how well this may work I can’t get past the initial smell and I am sending mine back. I’ve used a lot of leather care products and this is the first I couldn’t use at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kingston73

customer_reviews.title: Better than new
customer_reviews.text: I have a somewhat unnatural love for my car. With that understanding, I'm particular about what I use to clean my car. This stuff is great. My car seats are immaculate now. Tri-nova goes on really easily with the included applicator and after following the very basic instructions my seats are clean, conditioned, and look amazing. The cleaner leaves zero residue, which is another big win. The only minor knock on this stuff is the smell is kind of ok. Compared to the smell of the Tri-Nova interior detailer, the leather conditioner is a let down. That said, it's definitely not a deal breakers and I love the leather conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: J HowlandTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Smell is foul and very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Smell is foul and very powerful. It smells like very stout urine, so much so that we question if that is what is in it especially since the ingredients are not listed on the bottle. I am way past refund deadline. Why do some folks love it? Does it expire? Clearly my bottle is different than the majority because nobody would put up with this smell! It is burning our eyes. I am going to wipe my couch down now with water and throw this bottle in the trash. The whole room smells and I've only used it on the recliner. I am not joking when I say it is burning our eyes.
customer_reviews.author: chester

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all for my brown leather purse
customer_reviews.text: Was trying to clean up an old, well-used brown leather bag from Italy and thankfully did a test spot on the inside lip of the bag. I followed instructions on the bottle to a T and yet over 4 hours later the test spot is very dark and roughened up. Lots of brown color seemed to come off on towel even though I was rubbing lightly. The cap was broken during the shipping process and cleaner had spilled in the box. See pictures. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Bottle came damaged but product works great...
customer_reviews.text: The bottle came damaged and oddly there was no cap when I screwed it off. However after I took the top off a second time, I noticed there was now a top on it. I later contacted customer service and was sent a brand new bottle within two days!!not! This product is awesome and I recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Stern

customer_reviews.title: A
customer_reviews.text: I used the TriNova leather cleaner for my leather couch and recliner. The Smell was very chemical: sharp and maybe acidic. There was no ingredients description anywhere on the bottle. The furniture I used it on appeared a little cleaner but not anymore than if I used water. The smell made me feel it was unsafe or in some way hazardous. I was overall dissatisfied and will not use it again
customer_reviews.author: Ren Tenny

customer_reviews.title: Leather good as new!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this conditioner to brighten up my leather car seats but decided to use it on a leather furniture as well. After applying it with the applicator included it made the leather very soft and it looked good as new. I decided to buy a second bottle for my car! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: CLW

customer_reviews.title: after just one application it looked much better and now after using it once a month
customer_reviews.text: I have such a pet peeve about leather cleaners feeling greasy and gross when you use it. This one is the total opposite! It's silky and smooth and we can see the difference immediately. Also, our leather couch was dried out and starting to crack, after just one application it looked much better and now after using it once a month, the couch is like new.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING, for furniture AND leather boots
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING!! These photos are of my couch, I’ve done the left but not the right... the far away pic doesn’t do it justice, so I also uploaded the close up ones which show the major difference... this is a product you wipe on, let it sit for at least an hour, then wipe off... I gave it 4 stars for that. The smell is similar to a leather smell. I’ve also used this on my leather boots and the outcome is also amazing on those. I highly recommend this product. Pictures speak volumes...
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Superb Customer Care
customer_reviews.text: I need to give these guys a good review. Unfortunately, I did not like the product as the consistency of the product is like water. Being so thin, I could see it not working well for me on vertical automotive leather surfaces. When I contacted them about my concerns, they promptly gave me a refund, no questions asked. I hadn't really expected that. I will say that if you are okay with the water like consistency, you will love the product. I did try a little on a seat and it seems to clean well, has a nice fragrance and doesn't seem to leave any residue.
customer_reviews.author: GK.

customer_reviews.title: ASTOUNDING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: ASTOUNDING PRODUCT. I have tried EVERY OTHER Leather Conditioner and Cleaner on the market on my leather furniture. so called renewal products... deep cleaning products... even the most expensive leather cleaner/conditioner kits.. NONE works as well as TriNova Leather Conditioner and Cleaner. This is truly amazing product. My leather sofa and chairs look SHOWROOM NEW. I almost did not believe the result. Family member who was familiar with my furniture was shocked... thinking I bought new furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki

customer_reviews.title: It actually worked a lot better than I hoped!
customer_reviews.text: I have a beat up massive tan leather chair in my living room that I've thought of getting rid of because of all the scratches, etc. I bought this product as a last resort although I thought it was a lost cause because no one ever took care of this ancient thing. The product, to my surprise, worked very well! The scratches came off for sure, and it evened out the color so that blemishes are less noticeable. I noticed it made it less shiny, I think that is because it had softened out the leather so that doesn't bother me. It doesn't look brand new or anything, but it definitely looks like it has been airbrushed a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: just a foul odor. I should have know by the thin ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to using it and not impressed. Applied to recliner, loveseat, and full couch. Followed bottle directions, and after 30 mins all look the same. No improvement, just a foul odor. I should have know by the thin liquid that poured out of the bottle, that this would not be helpful. Overall i would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: R.A. Maestro

customer_reviews.title: This is like magic in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is like magic in a bottle. I have leather seats in my car and truck and used it on my car first. Granted the vehicle is only a few years old but it brought the seats back to life, almost showroom condition. The rating are legit and it's worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: chris c sirignano

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bottle of Trinova Leather Cleaner and Conditioner 16 months ago for my beautiful, expensive white leather overstuffed sofa. This sofa is the main piece of furniture in my living room and it gets hours of daily use. I'm still using my first bottle of Trinova - even though this is a very large sofa, it doesn't take much product to clean and condition it. The sofa looks just as great as it did the day I bought it. Trinova cleans beautifully and keeps the leather soft and supple. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy R.

customer_reviews.title: Great safe leather cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my Coach purse and Coach wallet. Really freshened up the leather without changing the color or texture of the leather. I was concerned about using a leather cleaner/conditioner that wasn't from Coach as I didn't want to ruin the beautiful Coach leather, but their product is so expensive. This worked great and it's so much more reasonably priced. I'll buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I originally wrote a less than positive review. TriNova reached out with a possible solution shipping a complimentary leather brush and bottle of conditioner/restorer with recommendations to proceed. I am extremely satisfied with the result. The leather has a soft sheen and is supple to the touch. Before it was dull. Thanks to TriNova for pursuing this and making me a believer.
customer_reviews.author: Bluffdad

customer_reviews.title: Another Slam Dunk Product....You Got to Have!
customer_reviews.text: This is another slam dunk product, that you got to have. This is the 4th product that I tried from Trinova, and I have yet to be disappointed. What more can I say, besides the products work and it lasts. Now I keep my seats pretty clean, but this is the first time I used leather conditioner and cleaner. However, this product took things to a whole another level. In the picture you can see the two seats (driver side, middle) that were treated with the conditioner/cleaner, and the one (on passenger side) not yet treated. I recommend you getting this product today.
customer_reviews.author: God's Child

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my couch new!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I've purchased this product twice now and the difference was significantly much more noticeable by the time I opened the second bottle since I went approximately 3 months without it. It has left my couch soft to the touch again and has removed the greasy, rough layer of grime and oil. It even seems to have removed some of the wrinkles and scuffs as well. I'll probably try these on my favorite boots as well!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Okay Cleaner | Unpleasant Scent
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware: This product smells pretty unpleasant. It works ok...cleaned/conditioned my light gray leather car interior, though not any more effectively than other products I've used. I found the smell so offputting that I will not use it again. It lingered in my car for nearly a week. If it worked some kind of cleaning magic, I might overlook the smell but I didn't feel it was anything special.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: I liked the large applicator pad included with the product
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product, once I unscrewed and removed the black cover, the inside white plastic "cap" came off as well. It appears to be cracked/broken. This did not prevent me from using the product though. I liked the large applicator pad included with the product. Within an hour of using this on my leather ottoman, it looked the same as it did prior to using the cleaner. I was expecting better results.
customer_reviews.author: titen0511

customer_reviews.title: Quality, value, results and ease of applicationsTepeacant
customer_reviews.text: Trinova was the 4th leather conditioner I tried and is the product I’ve decided to treat my leather furniture with, now and in the future. It had more product in it than it’s competition. It went on smoothly and was soaked up immediately. The furniture looked like it had been treated. I was pleased with the satin finish look after the furnituture was completed.The product left a suppleness to the leather. I am pleased in all respects with Trinova When it’s time to treat again I plan on using this brand. This is my 3rd bottle in 1 month. Update 6-21-19
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN T. WRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my $3000 leather sofa!
customer_reviews.text: This product completely ruined my $3000 Italian leather sofa ! It left the most horrible line because some of it splashed when wiping and i didn’t immediately wipe till I was done with the section I was working on . On top of that, it made the overall finish even MORE faded and gave it a rough texture . Too bad I can’t ask for a $3000 refund for ruining my couch! I honestly was shocked because of all the good reviews . So so Sad about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Richins

customer_reviews.title: Well, it removes dirt and grime...NOT stains!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for general cleaning, but not for removing stains. Blue jean stains on my truck tan leather did not come off after repeat applications as instructed on bottle. My wife's car had a yellow highlighter stains on tan leather....this product did not help at all. It did clean the "dirty-ness" off. But any leather cleaner will do this, probably even a wet rag.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Leather Lotion
customer_reviews.text: Worked well on our indoor furniture. Keep in mind that smearing this onto a worn leather surface will not remove wrinkles, much like smearing lotion onto your face won't remove wrinkles. Leather is cow skin after all. But it certainly revitalizes and provides a nice level of shine/visual enhancement to the surface. Give it a try and see for yourself. Think of it as leather lotion.
customer_reviews.author: disgruntled upon occasion

customer_reviews.title: It works. Saved a handbag.
customer_reviews.text: I was very freaked out to use this. I had an expensive Longchamp handbag that needed some love- and so I tested on the bottom, and then did the whole thing. WORKED PERFECTLY. Comes with a nice application pad thingy too. It was more watery than I expected (thought it would be more like lotion) but again worked great. My purse seems like new.I am now planning to hit a bunch of my shoes with this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Noticeable Results
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to applying this to my leather theater chairs and it seems to have made a visual difference and seems like it'll be a good product to maintain the leather on the seats over a long period of time (if time changes my opinion on this product, I'll update review accordingly).
customer_reviews.author: XDanteX

customer_reviews.title: Brings tired leather back to life.
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought some second-hand leather furniture for a real steal. The previous owners were selling it cheaply because they didn't realize it could be restored. We bought this TriNova bottle and gave the furniture a solid treatment 2 days in a row and now it looks almost brand new. I now can't wait to try it on our leather car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Admanc

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pretty amazing. My dog scratched up a cushion on my leather sectional and this was able to restore it to almost like new. Additionally, there were rings left by coffee cups and this removed them. I ordered another bottle to keep on hand. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: M. King

customer_reviews.title: Good leather conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This leather cleaner was easy to use, it was thinner than I would like but absorbs well and helped bring back my 15 year old leather chair and ottoman that I have to admit I have not conditioned as I should. The applicator pad is a bit small but works well and cleaned up after a run through the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Empress Ashley of Snail Land

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works.
customer_reviews.text: Bought my baby girl Jeep SRT back in '14, never having treated or conditioning it since. Apply this stuff on my worn down steering wheel and half my driver seat just once and the areas feel like brand new again. For the $15 price tag, I'm blown away. This bottle will last years of applications
customer_reviews.author: arianjalali

customer_reviews.title: The Trinova product is amazing. They obviously don't look like new again
customer_reviews.text: We have a pair of 15yo Lazyboy leather recliners that have seen some very hard use. We sit in them every evening, along with our 2 dogs and 3 cats, so you can imagine that they needed some serious leather cleaning and conditioning. The Trinova product is amazing. They obviously don't look like new again, but they are darn close! We have already reordered and now use Trinova about once a month. Buy this product!! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: craneman

customer_reviews.title: Be careful. Product spills out due to defective inner cap.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to clean and condition leather furniture. There is a white cap inside the outside black cap. The intent is to control the amount of product that flows out of bottle. Upon first use the white cap fell out of bottle and the product spilled everywhere making a a mess as it is a very liquid product. It is not possible to get the white cap to stay in bottle making it difficult to control the amount of product coming out. Not good
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Loendorf

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product several times to maintain leather sofa's. Conditioner is easy to apply and keeps sofa's looking new. . The only issue we have is when the product begins to dry, blotches appear. They do go away once the conditioner has fully dried, which usually takes several days. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 LARGE leather sofas, and 2 dogs that rarely sleep on the floor!! One sofa is about 15 years old and HAD scratches from the dogs. It no longer has the scratches!!! The newer sofa once again looks like new!!! We have tried numerous leather treatments over the years, this one ACTUALLY WORKS!!!!! Try it you won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. O'leary

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: Leather Cleaner did an incredible job. The sofa was far dirtier than I had thought. And I had just cleaned it a month ago with what I now realize was an inferior product. The product comes with a microfiber cloth to assist in the job. It is easy to use and takes very little time. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence M Hufty

customer_reviews.title: Great product , but s&h should be better
customer_reviews.text: I tried a product to clean shoes and a leather jacket. The result on shoes and boots was pretty impressive: shiny, clean, soft. The jacket wasn't clean as well, and darker area on the collar is still there. I plan to use the product on gloves. In addition, I want to mention that shipping and handling was a little disappointing. The cup was damaged and the product was spilled around the container, but inside the plastic wrap. I was very glad that you wrapped the container in a plastic. Apparently , more wrapping shoul be used or a more durable material should be used for containers. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Bibasik

customer_reviews.title: With this cleaner I was able to clean everything and my jacket looks like new. I am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have never left reviews on Amazon but wanted to take a minute to write this one. This product does wonders! I have a lime colored leather jacket (an expensive one) which hasn't been cleaned in about 2-3 years since I purchased it. With such a light color, there were a lot of stains on it, so I didn't think I would be able to get them off. With this cleaner I was able to clean everything and my jacket looks like new.I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was on the hunt for a good quality leather cleaner for my car seats and decided to give this product a try. The seats in my car had been ravaged by my son and other carpool kids, everything from dirty hands and feet and food and drink spills. After a wipe down with a clean damp cloth I applied this leather cleaner and conditioner. The sponge was not a pretty sight when I was finished. It worked great. Dried fast. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Have a large expensive leather recliner. This product does as well as some of the expensive "honey" products, is cheaper, and frankly requires less effort to apply. Just be careful - tried some on a vinyl piece and it left that very blotchy.
customer_reviews.author: dannebrog

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: This did a fantastic job on my couches but it had an unpleasant smell. It’s been 48hr and I can still smell it. I don’t know if I will use it again because of the smell which is a shame because otherwise it would be an outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Christy L. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: It worsks
customer_reviews.text: I used the cleaner and conditioner separately for about 3 years on my leather sofa and the leather interior of my cars. As for the car, it took a lot of time to detail, so I was super excited to see that the same company made an all in one. It does the trick for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa N.

customer_reviews.title: Looks like its gonna make it real hard to use without ...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I cant really give a real review as of yet. Got the product in the mail today and went to shake it up to use it and the product went EVERYWHERE!! The little plastic insert in the top of the bottle with the small hole is broken and will not stay in the bottle. Looks like its gonna make it real hard to use without making a mess...we'll see I guess
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Leather Care
customer_reviews.text: Works really well as a cleaner and conditioner. We bought a new leather couch and used Trinova cleaner and conditioner immediately. It cleaned up all of the initial dust and dirt very easily and also made the leather look new, supple, and rich.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brasch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several leather cleaners and conditioners over the years and have always been disappointed. This product was amazing. I have leather chairs and a coach and I have a dog who is always on or laying against the furniture. This product completely removed all the dog dirt and left the surface beautifully clean with a wonderful luster. My furniture looks like new. I don't know how long that will last but it is easy to use and given the results I will have no problem using it more often as necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Used this item on some BMW leather seats and also ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this item on some BMW leather seats and also on my leather sofa and it’s very watery and doesn’t seem to do anything... There is no visual difference looking at the side I did versus the side I have not treated. Still looking for something that actually soaks into the leather and conditions it
customer_reviews.author: David Dockery

customer_reviews.title: Intensely bad chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: The intense chemical smell is unbearable, and it saturated my purse with the smell. It also darkened my forest green Balenciaga bag by several shades so now it looks more like black/ green. The " buffer/cleaning cloth " left a lot of lent everywhere, and was bulky and unmanageable. I don't understand all the high reviews....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: I like how my leather couch feels cleaner, and softer. The process is more involved than I thought, but I'm very happy with this product. I'm already planning to buy more when I finish this current bottle. The instructions say to wipe down the leather with a damp cloth, wipe the leather with the cleaner/conditioner, let it sit about 30 minutes, wipe with a dry cloth.
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnna

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again, hydrates leather nicely.
customer_reviews.text: --Pros & Cons by Acid-- Pros::. Great product. I was hoping it would leave some kind of residue coating the leather but it doesn't! The product dries up nicely after hydrating the leather. Smells fine and again, no residue. Cons::. None. Overall::. Great product. Will be buying again as I'm already out!
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is horrible. It's almost all water. I used this for my boots and hate it. Did not soften the leather at all. I swear this product is like I just put my boots in water. Once it dried it seems like my boots are even more dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Bengsxr

customer_reviews.title: Leather couch
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the leather cleaner and conditioner. Used the comps in the tan bottle because we had a family gathering and that's all local store had with very poor results from this product . I had to get some more Trinova from the big A now our couch is back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: duane

customer_reviews.title: Defective packaging creates a mess. Customer Service Cleaned Up It's Mess
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it would effective but based on the bottle I received, there's no way to know for sure. The first time I went to use it, the dispenser cap piece fell out. This caused three quarters of the bottle to land on my laminate floor. Must be very emoleant rich, because cleaning it up, it wasn't easily absorbed. Total waste of money Update: Great customer service went above and beyond to make good and as such has made me a repeat customer
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Clark

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonders on white leather.
customer_reviews.text: I wondered how this would do on my white leather sofa and it worked perfectly. I should’ve taken a picture of a chair done because it looked black and white. With four boys that’s bound to happen. Only bad thing is I used about half of the bottle in one use. It’s worth it to buy more, though. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alan J. Bordon

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to help rejuvenate a Stickly leather sofa after our dogs got their paws on it. We had been using the recommended brand from stressors leather but this really blew that product out of the water. Really improved the look and feel. You can still see the scratches but, overall, looks much improved.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C. Pinnick

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Quality that Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Simple to use with a good finish that's light, non-greasy and absorbs well with minimal discoloration. And the follow-up by the company to be sure of satisfaction is as good as anyone's. They make a quality product at a good price. One that does the job well, and clearly a service-minded company that wants to do right by those that spend money on their products.
customer_reviews.author: DrManCO

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well, but...
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well, but did not restore and fill minor spider web-like scratching and abrasions, as some other products claim they can do. I did not are for the leather aroma of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Seazephyr

customer_reviews.title: I really love your product and wish I had started using a ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love your product and wish I had started using a cleaner and conditioner when I got my sofa's (14) years ago--They are cleaning up very nicely--Do you have just the conditioner also? I thought that would even be better for my neglected sofa's--I also wanted to thank you very much for replacing the damaged bottle I first received it was very unexpected and the only time a product was replaced when something like this has happened in the past--Thank you again--I will be a loyal customer!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost and most importantly, it's safe for leather!
customer_reviews.text: I first used this on my leather office chair. It's 10 years old now and after using the product it shows some life. Next, I used it on my 6 month old Katzkin seat covers in my Chevy truck. Katzkin only recommends one brand of leather cleaner but I decided to give this a shot. I first did a test area. worked fine. Then I did 2 applications over 2 days on the front seats and the result was excellent. I shall be using this product on a regular monthly basis as I already maintain the rest of my truck on a regular basis. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Bullzar

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders. My only dislike was minor and that is it smells strange when first applied. Once it dries the smell goes away. I apply at night and allow the product to sink in. I drive a convertible in souther California so my leather takes a beating from the sun. Also do not apply too much to the steering wheel as it might be slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Brendon

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I just used it today, so I'm not sure of the long lasting effects but so far it is great. My leather wasn't faded or cracked but I want to keep it looking fresh and this is the best stuff on the market from what I hear. My leather car seats are shining and look new.
customer_reviews.author: Dwells

customer_reviews.title: Nice surprise for a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Nice surprise for a very reasonable price. Bought to try on my western saddles after reading reviews and on the commendation on a friend. I like that it didn't leave a heavy residue and had a pleasant smell. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: crogers

customer_reviews.title: Great product, this leather conditioner has not faded my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, this leather conditioner has not faded my leather seats in my truck. Unlike most of the other over the counter or typical Auto parts store brands you buy. This conditional and the cleaners from Leather Nova gives your leather products a better look and feel to the leather after applying it. Most leather conditioners give your leather a dry dull look and after siting in the sun for a while, they start to crack and fade your leather, prematurely. I highly recommend Leather Nova for your Leather product restorations and care.
customer_reviews.author: Soupman 35

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend !!!
customer_reviews.text: This leather cleaner/conditioner is great! I used it on both of my leather sofas and they look brand new. Leaves the leather soft and shiny (that new look). I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not use a brush and just used the provided pad and was pretty satisfied with that
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned my black/grey leather seats in my vw r32. Removed quite a bit of dirt with little effort. Did not use a brush and just used the provided pad and was pretty satisfied with that. Didn't leave the seats glossy and plastic looking. Very natural feel and semi matte finish when done cleaning. Low odor that dissipated after a couple days. Will be buying more of their products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: wesley

customer_reviews.title: ... this stuff on several pieces and it's left a pretty healthy shine
customer_reviews.text: So far I've used this stuff on several pieces and it's left a pretty healthy shine! Hasn't gotten ALL my dirty off, but pretty clean, and the applicator pad works really well. I'd buy again. My only advice to the seller would be to include some kind of wash/lifeline instructions for the applicator pad. (Do I wash it? Do I just throw it out after one use? Is it good for several? Don't know) But great stuff in general.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hipius

customer_reviews.title: Really works on old leather.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on an very old alligator purse and it turned out so pretty. It did darken it some but wow! It's so shiny and soft now. I used it on some other purses with good results. It took a couple of applications to really cover some of the scratches but they really look and feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Cabh

customer_reviews.title: Solution works well
customer_reviews.text: It worked really well to clean my white leather couch. I didn't realize at first that when the cleaning sponge got dirty it didn't lift as much from the couch, so make sure to wash your sponge every 2sq ft or so of cleaning. I ended up switching to a microfiber rag that was bigger, but the cleaning solution works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Nani

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for jazzing up old leather!
customer_reviews.text: I love going thrifting and finding vintage leather purses, jackets, and belts. This leather conditioner works wonders on old leather! Everything I find at the thrift store gets a new, better life all thanks to the TriNova leather conditioner!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bottle that I order because I loved the first one! I bought a set of leather sofas and they turned out to be very delicate (although when I bought them I told them I had kids)! Anyways this product not only clean and condition them but seems to help with the scratches as well. It smells very good and it comes with an absorbent sponge!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo foul!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells HORRIBLE. I used it once in my car and it worked on light soil, but completely failed to remove the sunblock, ketchup, and pen ink from the leather seats (mom life). I gagged for days and had to drive with the windows open in cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is GREAT! I use it on my leather handbags
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is GREAT! I use it on my leather handbags, and it conditions, cleans and softens them beautifully! I spend a lot of money to get high-quality handbags, and this is the best for keeping them in tip-top condition. It's also much better than spending the money on the conditioner the department stores try to sell you. Plus it comes with a great buffer sponge/pad that is a nice accessory and helpful when cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: violetbouregard

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful but broken bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaner, great smell. My black leather chaise is glossy, it's so clean! My tan leather couch is clean, kind of unnerving how dirty it ended up being. Only complaint- the bottle dispenser plastic piece was broken, causing it to run down the bottle, never fully close, and if I didn't remove it, would have spilled all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: To me quality is Very important and good product that will do what it is suppose. Perhaps too early to rate it but I have been conditioning weekly my new leather sofas and I am satisfied. Like that the product does NOT leave greasy resedu afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadetta Soja

customer_reviews.title: Leather'head....
customer_reviews.text: Ok.... 20+ year old, leather bomber jacket... really lousy condition... some fuzzy mold on it, too! liberal application of this product brought this jacket back to life! The color and patina are back..... The leather is supple.... Smells like leather again..... Cannot begin to describe the joy of having my "Old Friend" wearable again. Highly recommend this product for your leather wear. Works on boots, too! Great product....
customer_reviews.author: J. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: not sticky or thick
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easy, and not like mayonaise as some others. Dries quickly. No need to buff, really, after application. I use my hands without any kind of cloth and that works best.
customer_reviews.author: T. W. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Short term slight improvement, long term no effect.
customer_reviews.text: Used on a couple of leather chairs. Nothing out of the ordinary. It made the leather a bit better but nothing groundbreaking or remarkable. Given the price id rather buy this and have ok results than the expensive stuff that always disappoints. UPDATE: chairs looked good for a few weeks but faded back to normal and currently look just the same as if i had done nothing.
customer_reviews.author: stuff

customer_reviews.title: Liked the product
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a leather conditioner before. I have two LazyBoy recliners that are 15 years old. They have had ruff treatment and have been going to get something to treat the leather for a long time but kept putting it off. I finally decided to do something about it. I chose this product because it was rated good. I love what it did to the leather on my chairs and as soon as I get a warm day I'm going to treat the leather seats in my cars.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I kind of knew what to expect. The product is a bit thin and milky, but man did it work. I used this product on my 2 leather couches and it went from a dull finish to a nicely conditioned finish. These couches are new, but they looked even better then the day I received them. It didn't take too much of the product either! Glad I chose it.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for cleaning leather sofa. I use it weekly because I have two small dogs who get on the sofa and it’s white. Keeps it clean and the other day I had a spot and used it to remove it and it worked great. I’ve been using this product for a couple of years now and like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!  Fixes old, cracked and pitted leather!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stuff! I have leather furniture in my living area, and it suffers from the dry air. The conditioner that came with the furniture has never done a satisfactory job. My favorite recliner has suffered a lot and was had cracked and pitted leather on the arms and seat. This stuff fixed it with one heavy application!
customer_reviews.author: RealiT

customer_reviews.title: Works great!! Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does just what you want it to do - makes your leather look fantastic! We purchased a "distressed leather" sofa from a consignment shop for a 2nd home. I bought the TriNova and used it as directed...the sofa looks great! Applied it once (the leather sucked it up) and then again, the next morning, wiping off with a soft cloth after 30 minutes as directed. So happy I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: cchtul

customer_reviews.title: We're on our second bottle - It works well!
customer_reviews.text: We got our first leather furniture a couple of years ago and bought this product to help maintain the leather quality. This product works well and is reasonably prices.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. Although if you smell the conditioner from the ...
customer_reviews.text: Used on my kia forte. This thing is amazing. Although if you smell the conditioner from the bottle it smells wierd but after applying it to all the car seats it doesn't have a bad smell it actually smells quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Both my husband and myself consider this the best leather cleaner and conditioner we've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and myself consider this the best leather cleaner and conditioner we've ever used. Had some leather furniture in storage that had started to get a mold on it. After cleaning with grapefruit extract then applying this cleaner, we've not seen a re-occurance. Am now using on my older books to keep them from drying out and deteriorating as some of them are over 100 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: It now feels great. The only drawback was smell although it disappears ...
customer_reviews.text: I left my accent leather chairs outside for over a week and half and saw it hardening due to morning wet dew and summer heat. Bought this and applied liberally once at night for 2 days to let conditioner settle. It now feels great. The only drawback was smell although it disappears after a day when applied. That being said, this saved my leather accent chairs and Definitely worth the investment!!
customer_reviews.author: Optimus A. Prime

customer_reviews.title: Great for protecting leather coats and footwear.
customer_reviews.text: Love the pad and this conditioner & cleaner works well for leather jackets and all my footwear. Easy to use and the pad cleans up nicely in the clothes washer. I got out my ironing board, threw a very cheap towel over it and had a nice work surface for treating my two leather winter coats and all my shoes. I like to adjust the ironing board so I can sit down and do this while watching a DVD.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ford Ballard, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cleaner and conditioner for handbags!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Removed water stains from vachetta leather like a charm. The 1st photo is after 4-5 cleaning sessions (fully drying overnight then buffing in between). See before and after pics!
customer_reviews.author: Cat-n-Rolly

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Wish this came in a spray bottle. It’s very liquidly and kept spilling off the application sponge onto my floor. That is why I subtracted one star.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This leather conditioner is amazing I’ve used it on my BMW and my Leather couches and it softens and strengthens the leather to last for a long life span,I’d recommend this for any leather.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Raymond Dias

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had used this all along.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 10 year old couch -- it sadly had worn a hole in it from dryness, wear and I knew to save it I had to do something...so I looked for a good product and used this and it helped. I should have been using something this good all along instead of the crappy stuff the furniture store gave me -- this is a real cleaner and conditioner and I think it'll help keep the leather couch alive until I'm actually ready to replace it. Thanks for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Laurag

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to replace another product that I had used for some time but was only mildly satisfied with. I read the reviews on this product and decided to try it. The delivery was very fast. I used it today and my leather couch looks amazing! I would highly recommend this product both for speed of delivery and product satisfaction. I feel like I have a new leather couch. Thanks Leather Nova!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Collier

customer_reviews.title: Good for cleaning and light mosturizing
customer_reviews.text: The item worked well for cleaning and light moisturizing. However, if your wanting any sort of substantial conditioning you will need to purchase the leather conditioner and restorer. I ended up purchasing the conditioner after this didn't quite do the trick. Still a reasonable product which did a nice job removing dirt/grime from our leather sofas.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

product_meta.title: TriNova Leather Conditioner and Cleaner, 18 oz / 540 ml
product_meta.description: Size:1 BottleProvide THREE IN ONE All Round Care To Your Treasured Leather Products! Cleaning: Our product deeply cleans all leather and vinyl surfaces. Reduces stains and marks too. Conditioning: Provides instant restoration to leather by enriching the leather fibers and making it soft and supple. Protection: Prevents premature aging of leather, protects from drying and cracking.
feature_bullets: SIMPLE - Easy solution to clean, condition, and protect leather in a single application.
ENHANCED APPEARANCE - This combination product will clean dirty leather as well as restore color to faded pieces of furniture or well used handbags.

PROLONGED USE - neglected leather breaks down more quickly, fading and even cracking. By nourishing the surface and protecting it from UV rays you'll ensure your leather stays in the best possible shape.
USA MADE VALUE - Manufactured in Florida with a value-sized bottle and complimentary applicator pad to ensure you can use it as soon as you open your package.
A TRUSTED BRAND - TriNova has established itself as a leader in leather care, meaning you can purchase with confidence.
